data.trans_hint: Chúng ta cần ngăn ngừa bạo lực gia đình.
data.en_hint: We need to prevent family violence.
data.content_game_1: We need to prevent family violence.
data.answer_en_hint: We need to prevent family violence.

data.trans: Sự ăn cướp, vụ ăn cướp
data.trans_hint: Một vụ cướp ngân hàng đã xảy ra ngày hôm qua.
data.content_game_1: A bank robbery occurred yesterday.
data.answer_en_hint: A bank robbery occurred yesterday.

data.trans_hint: Có một vài vụ trấn lột gần đây.
data.en_hint: There have been several muggings recently.
data.content_game_1: There have been several muggings recently.
data.answer_en_hint: There have been several muggings recently.

data.trans_hint: Họ đã vi phạm hợp đồng.
data.en_hint: They have committed a breach of contract.
data.content_game_1: They have committed a breach of contract.
data.answer_en_hint: They have committed a breach of contract.

data.trans: Sự kết án, sự kết tội, sự tuyên bố ai có tội, bản án
data.trans_hint: Anh ta đã kháng cáo lại bản án kết tội mình giết người.
data.en_hint: He appealed against his conviction for murder.
data.content_game_1: He appealed against his conviction for murder.
data.answer_en_hint: He appealed against his conviction for murder.

data.trans: Hằn học, có thái độ thù địch
data.trans_hint: Người nói đã nhận được sự đón nhận hằn học từ khán giả.
data.en_hint: The speaker got a hostile reception from the audience.
data.content_game_1: The speaker got a hostile reception from the audience.
data.answer_en_hint: The speaker got a hostile reception from the audience.

data.trans_hint: Anh bị còng tay dẫn vào nhà tù.
data.en_hint: He was led away to jail in handcuffs.
data.content_game_1: He was led away to jail in handcuffs.
data.answer_en_hint: He was led away to jail in handcuffs.

data.trans: Nhân hậu, hiền hậu, khoan dung
data.trans_hint: Là người phạm tội lần đầu, anh ta nhận được mức án khoan hồng.
data.en_hint: As a first offender, he received a lenient sentence.
data.content_game_1: As a first offender, he received a lenient sentence.
data.answer_en_hint: As a first offender, he received a lenient sentence.

data.trans: Áp lực từ đồng trang lứa
data.trans_hint: Cô ta thừa nhận rằng do áp lực đồng trang lứa là muốn thật ngầu nên cô ta đã bắt nạt người khác.
data.en_hint: She admits that it was peer pressure to be 'cool' that drove her into bullying others.
data.content_game_1: She admits that it was Peer pressure to be 'cool' that drove her into bullying others.
data.answer_en_hint: She admits that it was Peer pressure to be 'cool' that drove her into bullying others.

data.trans: Hủy bỏ, bãi bỏ (một đạo luật)
data.trans_hint: Họ muốn bãi bỏ khoản thuế mà những người thừa kế của các triệu phú phải trả.
data.en_hint: They want to repeal a tax the heirs of millionaires pay.
data.content_game_1: They want to repeal a tax the heirs of millionaires pay.
data.answer_en_hint: They want to repeal a tax the heirs of millionaires pay.

data.trans_hint: Giấy phép của bạn có thể bị thu hồi bất cứ lúc nào.
data.en_hint: Your licence may be revoked at any time.
data.content_game_1: Your licence may be revoked at any time.
data.answer_en_hint: Your licence may be revoked at any time.

data.trans_hint: Mức phạt cho việc tham gia vào hoạt động tội phạm có tổ chức là rất lớn.
data.en_hint: The penalties for participating in organised crime are significant.
data.content_game_1: The penalties for participating in organised crime are significant.
data.answer_en_hint: The penalties for participating in organised crime are significant.
